title: A soueraigne cordial for a Christian conscience Content thi selfe with pacience, with Christ to bear the cros of paine which can wil the rec[m]pence, a thousand fold with ioyes againe let nothig cause thi hart to quail lau[n]ch out thi bote, hoise vp the sail put from the shore. And thou sure thou shalt atain vnto the port that shall remayne, for euermore.
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563, attributed name.
publicationDate: the .xi. day of May Anno Domi.M.D.Liiii [1554]
